Uses of Class
org.smpp.pdu.PDU

  • Packages that use PDU 
    Package Description
    org.smpp  
    org.smpp.pdu  

    • Uses of PDU in org.smpp

      Methods in org.smpp that return PDU 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PDU ReceivedPDUEvent.getPDU()
      Return the received pdu.
      PDU Session.receive()
      Returns a PDU received from SMSC.
      PDU Session.receive(long timeout)
      Returns a PDU received from SMSC.
      PDU Receiver.receive(long timeout)
      This method receives a PDU or returns PDU received on background, if there is any.
      PDU Receiver.receive(PDU expectedPDU)
      Called from session to receive a response for previously sent request.
      protected PDU ReceiverBase.receivePDUFromConnection(Connection connection, Unprocessed unprocessed)
      Elementary method receiving data from connection, trying to create PDU from them and buffering data in case the PDU isn't still complete.
      protected abstract PDU ReceiverBase.tryReceivePDU(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU)
      This method should try to receive one PDU from the connection.
      protected PDU Receiver.tryReceivePDU(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU)
      This method tries to receive one PDU from the connection.
      protected PDU OutbindReceiver.tryReceivePDU(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU) 
      protected PDU ReceiverBase.tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU)
      Calls tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection,PDU,long) with timeout set by setReceiveTimeout.
      protected PDU ReceiverBase.tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU, long timeout)
      For specified time tries to receive a PDU from given connection by calling method tryReceivePDU.
      Methods in org.smpp with parameters of type PDU 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Session.checkState(PDU pdu)
      Checks if the session's state allows sending the PDU provided.
      boolean Session.isPDUAllowed(PDU pdu)
      Checks if the pdu provided is allowed in the current session state.
      PDU Receiver.receive(PDU expectedPDU)
      Called from session to receive a response for previously sent request.
      void Transmitter.send(PDU pdu)
      Assigns unique sequence number to PDU, if necessary, and sends its data over connection.
      protected abstract PDU ReceiverBase.tryReceivePDU(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU)
      This method should try to receive one PDU from the connection.
      protected PDU Receiver.tryReceivePDU(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU)
      This method tries to receive one PDU from the connection.
      protected PDU OutbindReceiver.tryReceivePDU(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU) 
      protected PDU ReceiverBase.tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU)
      Calls tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection,PDU,long) with timeout set by setReceiveTimeout.
      protected PDU ReceiverBase.tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU, long timeout)
      For specified time tries to receive a PDU from given connection by calling method tryReceivePDU.
      Constructors in org.smpp with parameters of type PDU 
      Constructor and Description
      ReceivedPDUEvent(ReceiverBase source, Connection connection, PDU pdu)
      Construct event for pdu received over connection belonging to the receiver.
      ServerPDUEvent(Receiver source, Connection connection, PDU pdu)
      Creates event for provided Receiver and Connection with the received PDU.

      Methods in org.smpp.pdu that return PDU 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PDU PDU.createPDU(ByteBuffer buffer)
      This method gets the buffer and returns an instance of class corresponding to the type of the PDU which was in the buffer; the fields of the returned PDU are set to the data from the buffer.
      static PDU PDUFactory.createPDU(int commandId) 
      static PDU PDU.createPDU(int commandId)
      Creates an empty instance of class which represents the PDU with given command id.
